metadata.title: CVE-2016-3858 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - high
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in drivers/soc/qcom/subsystem_restart.c in the Qualcommsubsystem driver in Android before 2016-09-05 on Nexus 5X and 6P devicesallows attackers to gain privileges via a crafted application that providesa long string, aka Android internal bug 28675151 and Qualcomm internal bugCR1022641.

criterions.comment: linux-mako: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-flo: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
